Feb 7 (Reuters) -

  • AMAZON IS MORE THAN DOUBLING ITS MAXIMUM BASE SALARY TO $350,000 - INSIDER

  • AMAZON IS INCREASING ITS BASE PAY CAP TO $350,000, MORE THAN DOUBLING ITS PREVIOUS $160,000 MAXIMUM SALARY FOR MOST EMPLOYEES - INSIDER
